intro: Psychotria barraensis, commonly known as the Barra Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale green flowers. It is often found in moist, shaded habitats such as rainforests and undergrowth. The plant contains various alkaloids, which have been of interest in ethnobotanical and pharmacological studies.
